desc.en: Before the holiday ends, Junko comes to find Sensei in Schale. They go to see the Christmas tree and wander about the shopping complex together. When Junko's stomach growls, the two share dango and wish for a happy new year.
desc.jp: Before the holiday ends, Junko comes to find Sensei in Schale. They go to see the Christmas tree and wander about the shopping complex together. When Junko's stomach growls, the two share dango and wish for a happy new year.
desc.zh_cn: 在连假结束前，{cf淳子}来到了老师所在的{et夏莱}。两人一起去市区欣赏圣诞树和逛商店街。{cf淳子}的肚子突然冒出咕噜噜的声音，两人一起吃了团子后互相说新年快乐。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: More Food, More Fun! More Me?
name.jp: More Food, More Fun! More Me?

desc.en: It's Christmas day. The Justice Task Force is in a standoff with some thugs in a back alley and confiscates some strange item after apprehending them. After the Justice Task Force leaves the scene, the thugs are bemoaning their miserable predicament when they spot Sensei and the Remedial Knights out on charity activities and hatch a devious plan.
desc.jp: It's Christmas day. The Justice Task Force is in a standoff with some thugs in a back alley and confiscates some strange item after apprehending them. After the Justice Task Force leaves the scene, the thugs are bemoaning their miserable predicament when they spot Sensei and the Remedial Knights out on charity activities and hatch a devious plan.
desc.zh_cn: 圣诞节当天。{cn实现正义部}正在后巷的某处和混混们对峙中。很快就处理好情况，回收来历不明的物品。{cn实现正义部}悠哉离开后，混混们感叹自己输得一蹋糊涂的惨状，同时也发现了去进行慈善活动的老师和{cn救护骑士团}，并悄悄展开了可疑的计划。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

hobby.en: Climbing to high places, keeping an observational diary
hobby.jp: 高いところに登ること、観察日記を書くこと
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 登上高处、记录观察日记

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

desc.en: The Remedial Knights do their charity work with Sensei to spread the Christmas cheer. The Remedial Knights are busily working away when the thugs tell them about how the Justice Task Force stole their precious chicken for no good reason.
desc.jp: The Remedial Knights do their charity work with Sensei to spread the Christmas cheer. The Remedial Knights are busily working away when the thugs tell them about how the Justice Task Force stole their precious chicken for no good reason.
desc.zh_cn: 和老师一起进行慈善活动，传递圣诞节喜悦的{cn救护骑士团}。在忙着进行慈善活动的过程中，{cn救护骑士团}从混混口中得知{cn实现正义部}不分青红皂白抢走自己珍贵炸鸡的事情。

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Upon hearing the thugs' terrible tale, Serina and Hanae start to grapple with the true meaning of aid and salvation. After hearing the details of the situation, Mine begins to question her own shortcomings. She quickly heads to the Justice Task Force's end-of-year party alone to make a formal complaint.
desc.jp: Upon hearing the thugs' terrible tale, Serina and Hanae start to grapple with the true meaning of aid and salvation. After hearing the details of the situation, Mine begins to question her own shortcomings. She quickly heads to the Justice Task Force's end-of-year party alone to make a formal complaint.
desc.zh_cn: 听见混混们令人惋惜的事情后，{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}开始苦思何谓真正的救护。听说目前发生的一切情况后，{cf美祢}深切体会到自己的不足之处。过了一会儿，为了正式向{cn实现正义部}抗议，她独自离开了。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
